meanings.sent1: She was the ganglier of the two sisters, with longer limbs.
meanings.sent2: The tree looked ganglier in winter without its leaves.
meanings.sent3: The ganglier cat tried to squeeze through the narrow gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: His ganglier shadow stretched across the sidewalk in the evening sun.
meanings.sent5: The ganglier branches of the tree reached out like skeletal fingers.

meanings.sent1: The ganglier puppy struggled to keep up with the others during playtime.
meanings.sent2: Her ganglier frame made her self-conscious in the dance class.
meanings.sent3: The ganglier scarecrow in the field seemed to be doing a funny dance in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The ganglier shadows of the streetlights danced on the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The ganglier clouds in the sky resembled stretched cotton balls.

meanings.sent1: The ganglier branches of the tree swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: He felt ganglier than usual after skipping breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The ganglier giraffe had trouble bending down to drink from the waterhole.
meanings.sent4: The ganglier shadows of the buildings elongated as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The ganglier shadows of the fence created a striped pattern on the ground.
